data.title: I Want Candy
data.meta_description: "I Want Candy" is the song featured in the 1995 film Heavyweights and in the 1997 film Romy and Michele's High School Reunion, written by Bert Berns, Bob Feldman, Jerry Goldstein and Richard Gottehrer, and performed by Bow Wow Wow. This song was originally performed by the American band the...
data.text:
I know a guy who's tough, but sweet

He's so fine, he can't be beat

He's got everything that I desire

Sets the summer sun on fire

I want candy

I want candy

Go to see him when the sun goes down

Ain't no finer boy in town

You're my guy, you're what the doctor ordered

So sweet, you make my mouth water

I want candy

I want candy

Yeah

Candy on the beach, there's nothing better

But I like candy when it's wrapped in a sweater

Someday soon, I'll make you mine

Then I'll have candy all the time

I want candy

I want candy

I want candy

I want candy

Hey

Hey

Hey

Hey

Hey
